review: Great, took a long time to arrive but worth the weight.
author: Christian

review: Easy to set up and works great
author: Gary Oenning

review: Amazing just amazing, very fast and super easy to set up! So glad I went with this compared to Google Chrome cast!!!!
author: Trevor

review: The fire stick is fine but your selection in tv shows and movies are weak. Anything worth watching I've already seen and your prices are too high.Now that I have the internet I'll stick to Netflix!
author: Stephen Hebard

review: This one little device transforms any TV into a Smart TV.  I am very impressed with the picture quality and would say that it is a must have for less than $40!  My only reason for not giving it 5 stars is that I feel they need more apps from major networks and premium channels.  I also understand that this is a direct conflict with Amazon Instant Video's business model so that is why I did not give it less than 4 stars.
author: J. Finch

review: Love my fire stick. Need my HBO-Go still. But the website for the Fire stick says "coming spring 2015"! :)
author: Lauren
